short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to save web content to Blue.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Send To Blue - Save Website Information Directly to Blue.cc

Easily save web pages to your Blue.cc projects with the "Send To Blue" Chrome extension. Designed for people like me who love Blue.cc, this tool helps you capture and organize website content directly into your todo lists.

- Quick Setup: Connect using your API keys.
- Direct Saving: Choose where your tasks goâ€”right into the correct project and list.
- Smart Tags: Automatically fill in details with {{url}}, {{title}} etc
- Generate screenshots directly in your task

**NEW**
- Added due dates
- Keyboard shortcut and right click context menu for quickly capturing your data in Blue
- Selected text added to the smart tags.  After adding {{text}} to the description in options you can simply highlight any text in a webpage and send it to Blue with the icon, right click on shortcut.
- Clear button in the popup in case you just want to add un unrelated todo from your browser

** Coming Soon **
-- Assign to users
-- Add tags

Perfect for anyone who wants a no-fuss way to keep track of online content. Install now and streamline your workflow!

** This chrome extension is NOT associated with the official Blue.cc team.  I just love the product and wanted to use the API **
